mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE FROM PDS ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PDS(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE) VALUES (SEQ_PDS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{newFilename}, 0, 0, SYSDATE)
